verses.verse: Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Designate <S%H5414><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of refuge, <S%H4733><s%> of which <S%H834><s%> I spoke <S%H1696><s%> to you through <S%H3027><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%>

that the manslayer <S%H7523><s%> who kills <S%H5221><s%> any person <S%H5315><s%> unintentionally, <S%H7684><s%> without <S%H1097><s%> premeditation, <S%H1847><s%> may flee <S%H5127><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> and they shall become <S%H1961><s%> your refuge <S%H4733><s%> from the avenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood. <S%H1818><s%>

'And he shall flee <S%H5127><s%> to one <S%H259><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> and shall stand <S%H5975><s%> at the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> and state <S%H1696><s%> his case <S%H1697><s%> in the hearing <S%H241><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of that city; <S%H5892><s%> and they shall take <S%H622><s%> him into the city <S%H5892><s%> to them and give <S%H5414><s%> him a place, <S%H4725><s%> so that he may dwell <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H5973><s%> them.

'Now if <S%H3588><s%> the avenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%> pursues <S%H7291><s%> him, then they shall not deliver <S%H5462><s%> the manslayer <S%H7523><s%> into his hand, <S%H3027><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he struck <S%H5221><s%> his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> without <S%H1097><s%> premeditation <S%H1847><s%> and did not hate <S%H8130><s%> him beforehand <S%H4480><s%>. <S%H8543><s%> <S%H8032><s%>

'And he shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in that city <S%H5892><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he stands <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> for judgment, <S%H4941><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of the one who <S%H834><s%> is high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> in those <S%H1992><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%> Then <S%H227><s%> the manslayer <S%H7523><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H935><s%> to his own city <S%H5892><s%> and to his own house, <S%H1004><s%> to the city <S%H5892><s%> from which <S%H834><s%> he fled. <S%H5127><s%>' "

So they set <S%H6942><s%> apart <S%H6942><s%> Kedesh <S%H6943><s%> in Galilee <S%H1551><s%> in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> and Shechem <S%H7927><s%> in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> and Kiriath-arba (that is, Hebron <S%H2275><s%>) in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

And beyond <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> east <S%H4217><s%> of Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> they designated <S%H5414><s%> Bezer <S%H1221><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> on the plain <S%H4334><s%> from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> and Ramoth <S%H7216><s%> in Gilead <S%H1568><s%> from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> and Golan <S%H1474><s%> in Bashan <S%H1316><s%> from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh. <S%H4519><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> were the appointed <S%H4152><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and for the stranger <S%H1616><s%> who sojourns <S%H1481><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them, that whoever <S%H3605><s%> kills <S%H5221><s%> any person <S%H5315><s%> unintentionally <S%H7684><s%> may flee <S%H5127><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> and not die <S%H4191><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the avenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he stands <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the congregation. <S%H5712><s%>
